Description: Candlestick (?), stand made of wood, pith (?), bark (cedar), metal.
Curator's comments: Christy registration Slip annotation "Probably a candlestick". Both the Slip and Christy Register give provenance "Egypt ?". The computer record data entry form made out by J.Starkey (CDMS staff, 1981) gives "NWC; NAM" [North America] but without any source for this attribution. (AMD,10/1998).
